Trade/Device Name(s): MicroScan Synergies plus Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels
MicroScan Synergies plus Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels with Erythromycin
Regulation Name(s): Fully automated short-term incubation cycle antimicrobial susceptibility system
Specimen Type(s): Colonies grown on solid media of gram-positive staphylococci
Colonies grown on solid media of enterococci
Method(s)/Technology(ies): Rehydration with Synergies plus Pos Broth
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for MicroScan Synergies plus Gram-Positive MIC/Combo Panels with Erythromycin for antimicrobial susceptibility testing of gram-positive bacteria
Indications for Use Summary: Used to determine quantitative and/or qualitative antimicrobial agent susceptibility of colonies of rapidly growing aerobic and facultative anaerobic gram-positive staphylococci and enterococci, including Erythromycin testing at specified concentrations.
